"Special Training: Episodes 1~4":
"This is an exercise VR Training
quest. Aim for the final area
within the time limit.
This is a combined experience of
all the previous training exercises.
Using each and every person's wit,
skill and experience, plan your strategies.
――――――――――――――――――――
Time Limit: 20 minutes
Maximum damage cap/999999"
"Are you ready? The special training program will be starting soon!"
"This quest is a culmination of all the previous training quests you've encountered, so don't let your guard down for second!"
"With that, we'll start the transfer. Please do your absolute best!"
